thread.title: New team member at John Smith’s Stadium
thread.title_full: New team member at John Smith’s Stadium

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: New team member at John Smith’s Stadium
text:
New team member at John Smith’s Stadium New team member at John Smith’s Stadium Details Category: Appointments Created   16:00 The catering and events operation at one of Yorkshire’s top sports grounds has strengthened its team with a new appointment. Sodexo Prestige Venues & Events, which manages conferences and events at John Smith’s Stadium - home to Huddersfield Town Football Club and Huddersfield Giants Rugby League Club – has recruited Fenny Greenfield to the position of sales and marketing manager. 
Fenny, from Leeds brings more than a decade’s experience to the role, having worked in various areas of the hospitality sector both in the UK and abroad. A graduate of Leeds Beckett University, she will be tasked with managing and handling events, building sales and raising awareness of the stadium’s suitability for a wide range of functions, from large scale conferences and product launches, to social occasions and corporate meetings and dinners. “Anyone who, like me, has lived and worked in West Yorkshire, knows what a well-loved venue John Smith’s Stadium is,” said Fenny. “Not only is it a key sports ground, but it is also a hugely popular meeting and event venue with a superb team of on-site chefs and I can’t wait to get started.” “We are delighted to welcome Fenny to the team,” said Sodexo Prestige Venues & Events marketing manager Natasha Carr. “She is not only very well qualified, with extensive and relevant experience, but she is totally committed to raising the profile of the stadium, particularly within the corporate market.” Related articles
